reviewText: I was familiar with this Psalty from teaching Sunday School. I watched the little ones glue to the TV and I even learned the songs to teach them to sing along. My granddaughter is quite the singer so I had to order this for her. I love it, I sure do hope she does. Your kids will love it too. The kids in the tape are quite talented.  God bless you
Such a timeless message and timeless songs. These songs/dvd's made such an impact in my life and now they are making an impact on my own children. Love, Love, Love Psalty!!!! :)
I was disappointed with the video. I was hoping it would be similar the psalty videos my children watched. It is not.
My daughters loved this in video many years ago!  I'm so glad it's now available in DVD for my great granddaughter!  Thank you.
Great for little c kids.  Not only keeps them occupied, but they participate in singing
I bought these for my grandchildren.  My kids were raised on Psalty.  I love it
My children and I enjoyed Psalty for many years (it was video tapes then!) and now I'm getting a store for my grandchildren. The entertainment and lessons are invaluable.

It would have been better if the songs were with the cartoon figure shown on the cover but instead, its of a man dressed up in that costume and has his face painted blue. The way he's dressed up is not high quality--in comparison to barney.

Disappointed.  It was pretty expensive for media that is so short in time.  We will use it, but it won't be a favorite. Sorry. It is also old in it's production, could use a remake with graphics and better sound.
